workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.description: I am currently working as a Software Developer at HealthIndia Insurance TPA Services Pvt. Ltd., where I build full-stack web applications using Angular, ASP.NET Core, and SQL Server. I also completed an internship as an Angular Developer at Markets Mojo, contributing to data visualization and performance upgrades. I use tools like Git, Tortoise SVN, and Postman to ensure clean, testable code.

technicalSkills.title: Technical Skills
technicalSkills.description: Proficient in TypeScript, JavaScript, C#, and Python. Experienced with Angular, ASP.NET, Next.js, and Node.js for full-stack development. Skilled in working with SQL Server, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL. Familiar with tools like Git, Docker, Postman, and AWS EC2. Strong foundation in MVC, JWT Auth, and WebSockets.

educationAndCertifications.title: Education and Certifications
educationAndCertifications.description: I actively participate in Hackathons, LeetCode, and other tech-related activities. Below are some of my major certifications.
